2.label: Blinking behavior
2.description: This is actually a double byte value. The LSB defines the total time the device needs to blink in seconds. The MSB defines the on/off interval of the blink in tenths of seconds.

80.label: Notification status
80.description: Enables automatic notifications to associated devices whenever there is a state change.

91.label: Wattage threshold
91.description: The minimum change in wattage for a report to be sent.

92.label: Wattage threshold percent
92.description: Minimum change in percent of wattage to send a report.

100.label: Default Group Reports
100.description:
Set report types for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default. Reverts to 0
	after set.

101.label: Report type G1
101.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 1. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

102.label: Report type G2
102.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 2. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

103.label: Report type G3
103.description:
Defines the type of report sent for reporting group 3. 2 is multisensor report. 4 is meter report for watts. 8 is meter report for kilowatts.
	 Value 1 (msb) Reserved
	 Value 2 Reserved
	 Value 3 Reserved
	 Value 4 (lsb) bits 7-4 reserved
                     bit 3 MRC(KWH)
		     bit 2 MRC(watt)
		     bit 1 MSRC
		     bit 0 reserved

	The MRC(KWH) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(KWh) automatically.

	The MRC(Watt) flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Meter Report Command(wattage) automatically.

	The MSRC flag signals that Report Group 1 send(1) or don't send(0)
	Multilevel Sensor Report Command(wattage) automatically.

110.label: Default Group Time
110.description: Set time interval for sending reports for groups 1, 2 and 3 to default.

111.label: Send interval G1
111.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 1 is sent.

112.label: Send interval G2
112.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 2 is sent.

113.label: Send interval G3
113.description: Defines the time interval when the defined report for group 3 is sent.
